properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point California out to 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 5 at 2:50AM PST until February 6 at 3:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point
California out to 10 nm.

* WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 3 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM PST THURSDAY
